name: Pots of Problems
description:
Will, little witch, student of Thistle Grove Academy, has a problem with her recent study of Orbital sansevieria monster plant. She accidentally accelerated their lifecycle, so plants started to age out of control. Will Will save her conservatory from this magical event? Only her smug cat Ike knows. 

Controls: 

WASD — movement

Step on items for interaction

Use potion to rejuvenate plants

Follow green arrow for instructions 

Team Stooped Puppies: 

  • 2D Designers: Arina Shlykova, Olga Tumanova
  • 3D Designer: Alexandr Shustov
  • Programmer: Mikhail Davydov
  • Sound Designer & Composer: Maria Astahova
  • Enviroment Designer & 2D Animator: Rostislav Kurianov
  • Game Designer & Level Designer: Dmitrii Obukhov
  • Project Manager & Content Manager: Ekaterina Shpagina
  • QA: Ilya Maximovich
